divs: Sighting DetailsA friend of mine was giving me a guitar lesson in his backyard. He says look over there around 2:00 in the eastern skies. I see an Egg like object, just hanging around. He and his mother tell me its been in the skies for days.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Pomona
There were no other sightings in Pomona on or around December 15th 2007
Summary: Egg like object, Hanging around the eastern skies for days
